summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of Trenton Street from 37th Avenue South to 39th Avenue South; and certain other streets and avenues, by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 16723 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a loacl improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
